schema.description: Measurement report provided by a CBSD.

eutraCarrierRssiRpt.description: Report structured used by a CBSD when a measurement report type is EutraCarrierRssiNonTx or EutraCarrierRssiAlways

eutraCarrierRssiRptObject.description: Report for a particular Carrier RSSI measurement.

measFrequency.description: Frequency of the low end of the measured channel in Hz.

measBandwidth.description: Measurement bandwidth of the channel in Hz.

measCarrierRssi.description: Carrier RSSI measurement of the channel in dBm as per 3GPP TS 32.592.
